title: How to write an attractive paragraph writing - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.) Structure: The organization of the paragraph is quintessential to making it legible and attractive. Hook the reader in with your first few words, introduce a single sentence summary of its contents and then carefully choose the elements to extend upon and the ones to brush past and then end with a clean sentence. Just like this paragraph you read right now. 2.) Punctuation: The importance of punctuation cannot be stressed enough. The utilization of each and every punctuation symbol is a blessing of its own. Remember that a comma, whether it is for a pause or a list, is just as essential as a full stop. 3.) Revision: Whenever you can, try and read the sentences you have written and see if you can replace some of the words with better vocabulary or shorter sentences. The previous sentence can also be written as: Try and optimize your sentences wherever possible. Hope this was helpful. All the best! here are some links to help you improve: Great grade-level writing topics Sentence Construction P.S. please do not take this in any offense but you used “write” twice in your question. Remember that grammatical errors can also significantly affect the appeal of your paragraph. God bless.
